sense.gloss: inquisitively, pryingly, nosily, thoroughly, persistently, through-and-through

sdata.j: メアリーに↑根↑↓|ね↓↑掘↑↓ほ↓り↑葉↑↓は↓↑掘↑↓ほ↓り|↑聞↑↓き↓かれたくないから、↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑離婚↑↓りこん↓することはここだけの↑話↑↓はなし↓にしておいてね。
sdata.e: I don't want to hear Mary's incessant questioning so keep this talk of my divorce between us.

sdata.j: ↑根↑↓|ね↓↑掘↑↓ほ↓り↑葉↑↓は↓↑掘↑↓ほ↓り|↑聞↑↓き↓いてごめん。
sdata.e: Sorry for bombarding you with so many questions.
